issue.title: [Python] Doctest failure in pyarrow.parquet.read_metadata after 10.0.0 dev version update
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17296](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17296). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The version update caused the doctest in this function to fail

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17296?focusedCommentId=17574930) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
